tr.td: How many standard alcoholic drinks do you drink per week? One standard drink is equal to 12.5ml of pure alcohol, or roughly 1 small glass of wine/25cl of regular beer (5% alcohol).

valueString.value: Patient information to pre-populate the form with

text.value: What is the patient's full name?

display.value: Identifies as male
Identifies as female
Female-to-male transsexual
Male-to-female transsexual
Identifies as non-conforming
Asked but unknown

text.value: Indicate the patient's gender identity. Do you think of yourself as…?
Please indicate the ethnicity that you identify with
Please indicate the biological race that you identify with

display.value: At home, with no community support
At home with community support
In an assisting living home in the community (senior's home)
In a rehabilitation hospital or skilled care facilities (SNIF, IRF, LTACH)
In long term care (nursing home, chronic care hospital)

text.value: Where were you living prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)? (The most recent place of residence pre stroke)

display.value: Yes, I lived alone
No, I shared my household with a spouse/partner or another person (e.g. sibling, children, parents)

text.value: Did you live alone prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)?

display.value: Able to walk without help from another person with or without a device.
Able to walk with help from another person.
Unable to walk.

text.value: Were you able to walk prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)?

display.value: I needed help to go to the toilet.

text.value: Did you need help from anybody to go to the toilet prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)?

display.value: I could manage dressing/undressing without help.
I needed help dressing/undressing.

text.value: Did you need help with dressing/undressing prior to your stroke or transient ischaemic attack (TIA)?

display.value: Current every day smoker (a person who smokes daily).
Current weekly smoker (a person who smokes at least weekly but not daily).
Former smoker (a person who does not smoke at all now, but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes or a similar amount of other tobacco products in his/her lifetime).
Never smoker.
Unknown if ever smoked.

text.value: A person's current and past smoking behavior
How many standard alcoholic drinks do you drink per week? One standard drink is equal to 12.5ml of pure alcohol, or roughly 1 small glass of wine/25cl of regular beer (5% alcohol).
